name: Fate Collectors
description:
Get ready to be thrown into a thrilling adventure unlike any other! Fate Collectors follows the journey of Elaina Evans, a seemingly ordinary 15-year-old girl, as she is suddenly plunged into a world of demons and darkness after having a mysterious dream. But that's not all, Elaina learns that she is part of a special group of individuals, known as Fate Collectors, who are appointed as the only ones that can stop the impending doom that threatens to consume the world!

In this captivating visual novel-style RPG, you'll play as Elaina and her fellow collectors as they navigate through the treacherous and unknown alternate universe called the Dream Realm. Strengthen your powers, uncover hidden secrets, and take down the imposing Fortresses that threaten to destroy everything in their path.

Fate Collectors is a magical girl story with a bit of a twist, as elements of darkness and despair keep you on the edge of your seat until the very end. So, are you ready to embrace your destiny and become a Fate Collector?
